title: Current status, trends, and predictions in the burden of coal worker's pneumoconiosis in 204 countries and territories from 1990 to 2019
content:
Publication date: 15 October 2024

Source: Heliyon, Volume 10, Issue 19

Author(s): Zhuofeng Wang, Jiaqi Zhang, Yong Yang, Mao Cao, Jiazi Ma, Shumin Li, Hua Shao, Zhongjun Du
